com.yworks.yfiles.view

Interface ICanvasContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILookup
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IInputModeContext, IRenderContext

    public interface ICanvasContext
extends ILookup
    This interface describes the context for many operations performed on items in a CanvasControl.

    This interface extends the ILookup interface to provide dynamic lookup capability.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ICanvasContext DEFAULT
      Provides a default immutable context with a hit radius of 3 and a zoom level of 1.

      • Fields inherited from interface com.yworks.yfiles.graph.ILookup

        EMPTY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas)
      Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.
      static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas, double zoom)
      Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.
      static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas, double zoom, double hitTestRadius)
      Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.
      CanvasControl getCanvasControl()
      Yields the Canvas that is associated with this context.
      double getHitTestRadius()
      The radius for hit tests and marquee selection tests in world coordinates.
      double getZoom()
      Returns the current zoom level that is the ratio of world coordinates to screen pixels.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yworks.yfiles.graph.ILookup

        createDictionaryLookup, createDynamic, createSingle, createSingle, createWrapped, lookup, lookup, lookup, safeLookup

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final ICanvasContext DEFAULT
        Provides a default immutable context with a hit radius of 3 and a zoom level of 1.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas)
        Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.

        If the values for zoom or hitTestRadius are not specified, the values will be obtained from the given canvas.

        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas

      • create

        static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas,
                             double zoom)
        Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.

        If the values for zoom or hitTestRadius are not specified, the values will be obtained from the given canvas.

        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas
        zoom - the zoom level

      • create

        static ICanvasContext create(CanvasControl canvas,
                             double zoom,
                             double hitTestRadius)
        Provides a default immutable ICanvasContext with the given values.

        If the values for zoom or hitTestRadius are not specified, the values will be obtained from the given canvas.

        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas
        zoom - the zoom level
        hitTestRadius - the hit test radius

      • getCanvasControl

        CanvasControl getCanvasControl()
        Yields the Canvas that is associated with this context.

        This value may be null in those cases where no control can be associated with the current context.

        Returns:
        The CanvasControl.

      • getHitTestRadius

        double getHitTestRadius()
        The radius for hit tests and marquee selection tests in world coordinates.

        This value already takes the zoom level into account.

        Returns:
        The HitTestRadius.

      • getZoom

        double getZoom()
        Returns the current zoom level that is the ratio of world coordinates to screen pixels.
        Returns:
        The Zoom.
